BEFORE:
x = self.conv1(x)
        x = self.bn1(x)
        x = self.relu(x)    # 32x32

        x = self.layer1(x)  # 32x32
        x = self.layer2(x)  # 16x16
        x = self.layer3(x)  # 8x8

        x = self.avgpool(x)
        x = x.view(x.size(0), -1)
        x = self.fc(x)

        return x
AFTER:
out = F.relu(self.bn1(self.conv1(x)))
        out = self.layer1(out)
        out = self.layer2(out)
        out = self.layer3(out)
        out = F.avg_pool2d(out, out.size()[3])
        out = out.view(out.size(0), -1)
        out = self.linear(out)
        return out
